<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Captivator Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=3359) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 120</row>

**Archetype** [Captivator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=125)

**Prerequisites**
[Captivator Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3358)

</column>

---

Your innate ability to fascinate others develops into full-fledged spellcasting. This spellcasting comes naturally and instinctively to you, rather than as a product of training. Choose a 1st-level occult spell from either the [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61) or [illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92) school. You can Cast this Spell as an occult innate spell. At 6th level, you gain a 2nd-level spell, and at 8th level, you gain a 3rd-level spell. Each of these spells must be from either the enchantment or illusion school.

<title level="2">Basic Captivator Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Captivating Intensity](/Feats.aspx?ID=3360), [Countercharm](/Feats.aspx?ID=3361), [Expert Captivator Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=3363)
name: Basic Captivator Spellcasting
